title: help./prysm.sh beacon-chain --http-web3provider=http://localhost:8545
body:
![snapshot1 20201208](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75147624/101481097-981bd700-398f-11eb-9b5f-085fdba2d2e1.png) ![snapshot geth syncing 20201208](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75147624/101481126-9eaa4e80-398f-11eb-9e77-86b51944cf24.png) # üêû Bug Report ### Description A clear and concise description of the problem... i use geth as the eth1.0. 2days later,geth get the newest block then i start to run prysm the step two, i write the note like this in terminal window: ./prysm.sh beacon-chain --http-web3provider=http://localhost:8545 then return a error:like this: ERROR powchain: Could not connect to powchain endpoint error=eth1 node has not finished syncing yet ### Has this worked before in a previous version? no Yes, the previous version in which this bug was not present was: ....1.0.4 ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction i did not upload any confidential files or private keys.it is step three,now i am step two: ## üî• Error
ethereum@ubuntu:~/prysm$ ./prysm.sh beacon-chain --http-web3provider=http://localhost:8545 Latest Prysm version is v1.0.4. Beacon chain is up to date. Verifying binary integrity. beacon-chain-v1.0.4-linux-amd64: OK gpg: Signature made Mon 07 Dec 2020 09:46:32 AM PST gpg: using RSA key 0AE0051D647BA3C1A917AF4072E33E4DF1A5036E gpg: Good signature from "Preston Van Loon " [unknown] gpg: WARNING: This key is not certified with a trusted signature! gpg: There is no indication that the signature belongs to the owner. Primary key fingerprint: 0AE0 051D 647B A3C1 A917 AF40 72E3 3E4D F1A5 036E Verified /home/ethereum/prysm/dist/beacon-chain-v1.0.4-linux-amd64 has been signed by Prysmatic Labs. Starting Prysm beacon-chain --http-web3provider=http://localhost:8545 [2020-12-08 03:36:39] WARN flags: Running on ETH2 Mainnet [2020-12-08 03:36:39] INFO flags: Using "max_cover" strategy on attestation aggregation [2020-12-08 03:36:39] INFO node: Checking DB database-path=/home/ethereum/.eth2/beaconchaindata [2020-12-08 03:36:39] INFO node: Deposit contract: 0x00000000219ab540356cbb839cbe05303d7705fa [2020-12-08 03:36:39] INFO initial-sync: Waiting for state to be initialized [2020-12-08 03:36:39] INFO node: Starting beacon node version=Prysm/v1.0.4/b4437e6cecd78257d2699f42073a90a940baf716. Built at: 2020-12-07 16:42:42+00:00 [2020-12-08 03:36:39] INFO blockchain: Waiting to reach the validator deposit threshold to start the beacon chain... [2020-12-08 03:36:39] INFO rpc: gRPC server listening on port address=127.0.0.1:4000 [2020-12-08 03:36:39] WARN rpc: You are using an insecure gRPC server. If you are running your beacon node and validator on the same machines, you can ignore this message. If you want to know how to enable secure connections, see: https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/prysm-usage/secure-grpc [2020-12-08 03:36:39] INFO gateway: Starting JSON-HTTP API address=127.0.0.1:3500 [2020-12-08 03:36:39] ERROR powchain: Could not connect to powchain endpoint error=eth1 node has not finished syncing yet github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).dialETH1Nodes beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:401 github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).connectToPowChain beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:364 github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).waitForConnection beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:438 github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).Start.func1 beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:257 runtime.goexit GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1374 could not dial eth1 nodes github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).connectToPowChain beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:366 github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).waitForConnection beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:438 github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain/powchain.(*Service).Start.func1 beacon-chain/powchain/service.go:257 runtime.goexit GOROOT/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1374 ![snapshot1 20201208](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75147624/101480376-900f6780-398e-11eb-9b20-e604f690c40d.png) ![snapshot geth syncing 20201208](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/75147624/101480387-96054880-398e-11eb-8194-367fe37fe572.png) ## üåç Your Environment **Operating System:**ubuntu
**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)**1.0.4
**Anything else relevant (validator index / public key)?** i don't know the mistake ,about do the work more than 2 weeks ,can any hot-heart man/women could help me??thanks!!
@navy665180 Your eth1 node is still syncing, which is why you still see that error. You have to wait a while before your geth node is ready to serve after syncing.
